df-sect
blocks.content: Function returning the section relation in a category. Given arrows ` f : X --> Y ` and ` g : Y --> X ` , we say ` f Sect g ` , that is, ` f ` is a section of ` g ` , if ` g o. f = 1 `` X ` . If there there is an arrow ` g ` with ` f Sect g ` , the arrow ` f ` is called a _section_, see definition 7.19 of [Adamek] p. 106. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-sect(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  |- wceq(csect, cmpt(s0, ccat, cmpo(s1, s2, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), copab(s3, s4, wsbc(s5, cfv(chom, cv(s0)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s3), co(cv(s1), cv(s5), cv(s2))), wcel(cv(s4), co(cv(s2), cv(s5), cv(s1)))), wceq(co(cv(s4), co(cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cfv(cco, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cv(s3)), cfv(cfv(ccid, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s5)
  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-sect(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  ‚ä¢ Sect =(s0 ‚àà Cat ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà(Base ` s0), s2 ‚àà(Base ` s0)‚Ü¶ { < s3, s4 > |[(Hom ` s0)/ s5]((s3 ‚àà(s1[s5]s2)‚àß s4 ‚àà(s2[s5]s1))‚àß(s4[(< s1, s2 >[(comp ` s0)]s1)]s3)=((Id ` s0)` s1))}))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s4, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
}

blocks.name: df-inv
blocks.content: The inverse relation in a category. Given arrows ` f : X --> Y ` and ` g : Y --> X ` , we say ` g Inv f ` , that is, ` g ` is an inverse of ` f ` , if ` g ` is a section of ` f ` and ` f ` is a section of ` g ` . Definition 3.8 of [Adamek] p. 28. (Contributed by FL, 22-Dec-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)

blocks.name: df-iso
blocks.content: Function returning the isomorphisms of the category ` c ` . Definition 3.8 of [Adamek] p. 28, and definition in [Lang] p. 54. (Contributed by FL, 9-Jun-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)

thm sectcan(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 = c1)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c3)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Sect ` c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà Cat)

  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0[(c5[c4]c6)]c7)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c7[(c6[c4]c5)]c1)
} = {
  3eqtr3d(c0, c1, (((Id ` c3)` c6)[(< c5, c6 >[(comp ` c3)]c6)]c0), (c1[(< c5, c5 >[(comp ` c3)]c6)]((Id ` c3)` c5)), w0)
  3eqtr3d((((Id ` c3)` c6)[(< c5, c6 >[(comp ` c3)]c6)]c0), (c1[(< c5, c5 >[(comp ` c3)]c6)]((Id ` c3)` c5)), ((c1[(< c6, c5 >[(comp ` c3)]c6)]c7)[(< c5, c6 >[(comp ` c3)]c6)]c0), (c1[(< c5, c5 >[(comp ` c3)]c6)](c7[(< c5, c6 >[(comp ` c3)]c5)]c0)), w0)
  catass(c1, c6, c5, (comp ` c3), c6, c7, c5, c0, c2, c3, (Hom ` c3), w0)
  simp1d(w0, c7 ‚àà(c6[(Hom ` c3)]c5), c1 ‚àà(c5[(Hom ` c3)]c6), (c1[(< c6, c5 >[(comp ` c3)]c6)]c7)=((Id ` c3)` c6))
  oveq1d((c1[(< c6, c5 >[(comp ` c3)]c6)]c7), (< c5, c6 >[(comp ` c3)]c6), c0, ((Id ` c3)` c6), w0)
  simp3d(w0, (c1[(< c6, c5 >[(comp ` c3)]c6)]c7)=((Id ` c3)` c6), c7 ‚àà(c6[(Hom ` c3)]c5), c1 ‚àà(c5[(Hom ` c3)]c6))
  oveq2d(c1, (< c5, c5 >[(comp ` c3)]c6), (c7[(< c5, c6 >[(comp ` c3)]c5)]c0), ((Id ` c3)` c5), w0)
  simp3d(w0, (c7[(< c5, c6 >[(comp ` c3)]c5)]c0)=((Id ` c3)` c5), c0 ‚àà(c5[(Hom ` c3)]c6), c7 ‚àà(c6[(Hom ` c3)]c5))
  catlid((Id ` c3), c6, c5, (comp ` c3), c0, c2, c3, (Hom ` c3), w0)
  simp1d(w0, c0 ‚àà(c5[(Hom ` c3)]c6), c7 ‚àà(c6[(Hom ` c3)]c5), (c7[(< c5, c6 >[(comp ` c3)]c5)]c0)=((Id ` c3)` c5))
  mpbid(w0, (c0 ‚àà(c5[(Hom ` c3)]c6)‚àß c7 ‚àà(c6[(Hom ` c3)]c5)‚àß(c7[(< c5, c6 >[(comp ` c3)]c5)]c0)=((Id ` c3)` c5)), c0[(c5[c4]c6)]c7)
  issect(c0, c5, c4, c6, c7, (Hom ` c3), (comp ` c3), (Id ` c3), c2, c3, w0)
  catrid(c1, c5, (comp ` c3), c6, (Id ` c3), c2, c3, (Hom ` c3), w0)
  simp2d(w0, c1 ‚àà(c5[(Hom ` c3)]c6), c7 ‚àà(c6[(Hom ` c3)]c5), (c1[(< c6, c5 >[(comp ` c3)]c6)]c7)=((Id ` c3)` c6))
  mpbid(w0, (c7 ‚àà(c6[(Hom ` c3)]c5)‚àß c1 ‚àà(c5[(Hom ` c3)]c6)‚àß(c1[(< c6, c5 >[(comp ` c3)]c6)]c7)=((Id ` c3)` c6)), c7[(c6[c4]c5)]c1)
  issect(c7, c6, c4, c5, c1, (Hom ` c3), (comp ` c3), (Id ` c3), c2, c3, w0)
  eqid((Hom ` c3))
  eqid((comp ` c3))
  eqid((Id ` c3))
}

thm sectco(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, class c10, wff w0) {

  -| wi(w0, wbr(c5, co(c1, c6, c2), c7))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, co(c2, c6, c4), c8))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wbr(co(c0, co(cop(c1, c2), c3, c4), c5), co(c1, c6, c4), co(c7, co(cop(c4, c2), c3, c1), c8)), wceq(co(co(c7, co(cop(c4, c2), c3, c1), c8), co(cop(c1, c4), c3, c1), co(c0, co(cop(c1, c2), c3, c4), c5)), cfv(cfv(ccid, c10), c1)))

  catass(c7, c4, c2, c3, c1, c8, c1, co(c0, co(cop(c1, c2), c3, c4), c5), c9, c10, cfv(chom, c10), w0)
  oveq2d(c7, co(cop(c1, c2), c3, c1), co(c8, co(cop(c1, c4), c3, c2), co(c0, co(cop(c1, c2), c3, c4), c5)), c5, w0)
  3eqtr3d(co(c8, co(cop(c1, c4), c3, c2), co(c0, co(cop(c1, c2), c3, c4), c5)), c5, co(co(c8, co(cop(c2, c4), c3, c2), c0), co(cop(c1, c2), c3, c2), c5), co(cfv(cfv(ccid, c10), c2), co(cop(c1, c2), c3, c2), c5), w0)
  oveq1d(co(c8, co(cop(c2, c4), c3, c2), c0), co(cop(c1, c2), c3, c2), c5, cfv(cfv(ccid, c10), c2), w0)
  simp3d(w0, wceq(co(c8, co(cop(c2, c4), c3, c2), c0), cfv(cfv(ccid, c10), c2)), wcel(c0, co(c2, cfv(chom, c10), c4)), wcel(c8, co(c4, cfv(chom, c10), c2)))
  catass(c8, c2, c4, c3, c2, c0, c1, c5, c9, c10, cfv(chom, c10), w0)
  catlid(cfv(ccid, c10), c2, c1, c3, c5, c9, c10, cfv(chom, c10), w0)
  simp3d(w0, wceq(co(c7, co(cop(c1, c2), c3, c1), c5), cfv(cfv(ccid, c10), c1)), wcel(c5, co(c1, cfv(chom, c10), c2)), wcel(c7, co(c2, cfv(chom, c10), c1)))
  issect2(co(c0, co(cop(c1, c2), c3, c4), c5), c1, c6, c4, co(c7, co(cop(c4, c2), c3, c1), c8), c3, cfv(ccid, c10), c9, c10, cfv(chom, c10), w0)
  catcocl(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, cfv(chom, c10), c9, c10, w0)
  simp1d(w0, wcel(c5, co(c1, cfv(chom, c10), c2)), wcel(c7, co(c2, cfv(chom, c10), c1)), wceq(co(c7, co(cop(c1, c2), c3, c1), c5), cfv(cfv(ccid, c10), c1)))
  simp1d(w0, wcel(c0, co(c2, cfv(chom, c10), c4)), wcel(c8, co(c4, cfv(chom, c10), c2)), wceq(co(c8, co(cop(c2, c4), c3, c2), c0), cfv(cfv(ccid, c10), c2)))
  catcocl(c7, c4, c2, c3, c1, c8, cfv(chom, c10), c9, c10, w0)
  simp2d(w0, wcel(c8, co(c4, cfv(chom, c10), c2)), wcel(c0, co(c2, cfv(chom, c10), c4)), wceq(co(c8, co(cop(c2, c4), c3, c2), c0), cfv(cfv(ccid, c10), c2)))
  mpbid(w0, w3a(wcel(c0, co(c2, cfv(chom, c10), c4)), wcel(c8, co(c4, cfv(chom, c10), c2)), wceq(co(c8, co(cop(c2, c4), c3, c2), c0), cfv(cfv(ccid, c10), c2))), wbr(c0, co(c2, c6, c4), c8))
  issect(c0, c2, c6, c4, c8, cfv(chom, c10), c3, cfv(ccid, c10), c9, c10, w0)
  simp2d(w0, wcel(c7, co(c2, cfv(chom, c10), c1)), wcel(c5, co(c1, cfv(chom, c10), c2)), wceq(co(c7, co(cop(c1, c2), c3, c1), c5), cfv(cfv(ccid, c10), c1)))
  mpbid(w0, w3a(wcel(c5, co(c1, cfv(chom, c10), c2)), wcel(c7, co(c2, cfv(chom, c10), c1)), wceq(co(c7, co(cop(c1, c2), c3, c1), c5), cfv(cfv(ccid, c10), c1))), wbr(c5, co(c1, c6, c2), c7))
  issect(c5, c1, c6, c2, c7, cfv(chom, c10), c3, cfv(ccid, c10), c9, c10, w0)

thm isofval(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ccat), wceq(cfv(ciso, c0), ccom(cmpt(s0, universe, cdm(cv(s0))), cfv(cinv, c0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, ccat), wceq(cfv(ciso, c0), ccom(cmpt(s0, universe, cdm(cv(s0))), cfv(cinv, c0)))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  fvmptd3(hs0, ciso, c0, ccom(cmpt(s0, universe, cdm(cv(s0))), cfv(cinv, c0)), ccat, ccom(cmpt(s0, universe, cdm(cv(s0))), cfv(cinv, cv(hs0))), universe, wcel(c0, ccat))
  df-iso(hs0, s0)
  coeq2d(cmpt(s0, universe, cdm(cv(s0))), cfv(cinv, cv(hs0)), cfv(cinv, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cinv)
  id(wcel(c0, ccat))
  sylancr(wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(ccom(cmpt(s0, universe, cdm(cv(s0))), cfv(cinv, c0)), universe), wfun(cmpt(s0, universe, cdm(cv(s0)))), wcel(cfv(cinv, c0), universe))
  funmpt(s0, universe, cdm(cv(s0)))
  fvexd(cinv, c0, wcel(c0, ccat))
  cofunexg(cmpt(s0, universe, cdm(cv(s0))), cfv(cinv, c0), universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ccom(cmpt(s0, universe, cdm(cv(s0))), cfv(cinv, c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(ccat)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

} = {

  fvmptd3(hs0, ciso, c0, ((s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ dom(s0))‚àò(Inv ` c0)), ccat, ((s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ dom(s0))‚àò(Inv ` hs0)), universe, c0 ‚àà Cat)
  df-iso(hs0, s0)

  funmpt(s0, universe, dom(s0))
  fvexd(cinv, c0, c0 ‚àà Cat)
  cofunexg((s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ dom(s0)), (Inv ` c0), universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(((s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ dom(s0))‚àò(Inv ` c0)))

thm invffval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, cin(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), ccnv(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cinv, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, ccat))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(csect, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, cin(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), ccnv(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))))), wi(w0, wcel(c4, c1)))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, cin(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), ccnv(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))))), wi(w0, wcel(c5, c1)))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, cin(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), ccnv(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, cin(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), ccnv(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))))), diffsc(s0, c4))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, cin(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), ccnv(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))))), diffsc(s0, c5))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, cin(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), ccnv(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))))), diffsc(s1, c2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, cin(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), ccnv(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))))), diffsc(s1, c4))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, cin(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), ccnv(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))))), diffsc(s1, c5))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, cin(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), ccnv(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))))), diffsw(s0, w0))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, cin(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), ccnv(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))))), diffsw(s1, w0))
  syl5eq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, cin(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), ccnv(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))), cfv(cinv, c3), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(cinv, c3), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, cin(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), ccnv(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))))), wcel(c3, ccat))
  fvmpt(hs0, c3, ccat, cinv, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, cin(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), ccnv(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))), cmpo(s0, s1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cin(co(cv(s0), cfv(csect, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)), ccnv(co(cv(s1), cfv(csect, cv(hs0)), cv(s0))))))
  mpoeq123dv(s0, s1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cin(co(cv(s0), cfv(csect, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)), ccnv(co(cv(s1), cfv(csect, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))), c1, c1, cin(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), ccnv(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(cbs, c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c3, cbs)
  ineq12d(co(cv(s0), cfv(csect, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)), ccnv(co(cv(s1), cfv(csect, cv(hs0)), cv(s0))), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), ccnv(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  oveqd(cv(s0), cfv(csect, cv(hs0)), cv(s1), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  cnveqd(co(cv(s1), cfv(csect, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  oveqd(cv(s1), cfv(csect, cv(hs0)), cv(s0), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  syl6eqr(cfv(csect, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(csect, c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c3, csect)
  df-inv(hs0, s0, s1)
  mpt2ex(s0, s1, c1, c1, cin(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), ccnv(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))))
  fvexi(c1, cbs, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(ccat)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, cin(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), ccnv(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm invffval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 =(s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶((s0[c2]s1)‚ãÇ `'(s1[c2]s0))))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c3)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(Inv ` c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà Cat)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Sect ` c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí c0 =(s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶((s0[c2]s1)‚ãÇ `'(s1[c2]s0)))), (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà c1))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí c0 =(s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶((s0[c2]s1)‚ãÇ `'(s1[c2]s0)))), (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà c1))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí c0 =(s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶((s0[c2]s1)‚ãÇ `'(s1[c2]s0)))), d(s0, c2))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí c0 =(s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶((s0[c2]s1)‚ãÇ `'(s1[c2]s0)))), d(s0, c4))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí c0 =(s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶((s0[c2]s1)‚ãÇ `'(s1[c2]s0)))), d(s0, c5))

  invfval(c1, c2, c3, c5, c6, c7, w0)
  brin(c0, co(c1, c5, c3), ccnv(co(c3, c5, c1)), c4)

  sectss(c3, c5, c1, cfv(chom, c7), c6, c7, cfv(cco, c7), cfv(ccid, c7), w0)

  invsym(cv(hs1), c0, c1, c2, cv(hs0), c3, c4, w0)
  bitr3i(wbr(cv(hs1), co(c0, c1, c2), cv(hs0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccnv(co(c0, c1, c2))), wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(co(c0, c1, c2)), cv(hs1)))
  brcnv(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2), cv(hs1))
  vex(hs0)

  df-br(cv(hs0), ccnv(co(c0, c1, c2)), cv(hs1))
  df-br(cv(hs0), co(c2, c1, c0), cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(ccnv(co(c0, c1, c2)))

  diff.hs1.c(ccnv(co(c0, c1, c2)))

thm invsym2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí `'(c0[c1]c2)=(c2[c1]c0))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Inv ` c4)

  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c3)

} = {
  mpancom(w0, `'(c0[c1]c2)=(c2[c1]c0), (Rel(`'(c0[c1]c2))‚àß Rel((c2[c1]c0))))
  jctil(w0, Rel(`'(c0[c1]c2)), Rel((c2[c1]c0)))

blocks.name: invfun
blocks.content: The inverse relation is a function, which is to say that every morphism has at most one inverse. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)

thm invfun(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wfun(co(c0, c1, c2)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cinv, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, ccat))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, wfun(co(c0, c1, c2)), wrel(co(c0, c1, c2)), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wal(hs2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2), cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))))
  mpisyl(w0, wrel(co(c0, c1, c2)), wss(co(c0, c1, c2), cxp(co(c0, cfv(chom, c4), c2), co(c2, cfv(chom, c4), c0))), wrel(cxp(co(c0, cfv(chom, c4), c2), co(c2, cfv(chom, c4), c0))))
  invss(c0, c1, c2, cfv(chom, c4), c3, c4, w0)
  eqid(cfv(chom, c4))
  relxp(co(c0, cfv(chom, c4), c2), co(c2, cfv(chom, c4), c0))
  relss(co(c0, c1, c2), cxp(co(c0, cfv(chom, c4), c2), co(c2, cfv(chom, c4), c0)))
  alrimivv(hs0, hs1, w0, wal(hs2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2), cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))
  alrimiv(hs2, w0, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2), cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))
  ex(w0, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2), cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))
  sectcan(cv(hs1), cv(hs2), c3, c4, cfv(csect, c4), c2, c0, cv(hs0), wa(w0, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2), cv(hs2)))))
  adantr(w0, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2), cv(hs2))), wcel(c4, ccat))
  adantr(w0, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2), cv(hs2))), wcel(c2, c3))
  adantr(w0, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2), cv(hs2))), wcel(c0, c3))
  adantrr(w0, wbr(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2), cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs1), co(c2, cfv(csect, c4), c0), cv(hs0)))
  simplbda(w0, wbr(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), co(c2, cfv(csect, c4), c0), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfv(csect, c4), c2), cv(hs1)))
  isinv(cv(hs0), c0, c1, c2, cv(hs1), cfv(csect, c4), c3, c4, w0)
  adantrl(w0, wbr(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2), cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfv(csect, c4), c2), cv(hs2)))
  simprbda(w0, wbr(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2), cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfv(csect, c4), c2), cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), co(c2, cfv(csect, c4), c0), cv(hs0)))
  isinv(cv(hs0), c0, c1, c2, cv(hs2), cfv(csect, c4), c3, c4, w0)
  eqid(cfv(csect, c4))
  dffun2(hs0, hs1, hs2, co(c0, c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs2.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)

  diff.hs1.c(co(c0, c1, c2))
  diff.hs2.c(co(c0, c1, c2))
}

thm invfun(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí Fun((c0[c1]c2)))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Inv ` c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà Cat)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c3)
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, Fun((c0[c1]c2)), Rel((c0[c1]c2)), ‚àÄ(hs0, ‚àÄ(hs1, ‚àÄ(hs2,((hs0[(c0[c1]c2)]hs1 ‚àß hs0[(c0[c1]c2)]hs2)‚Üí hs1 = hs2)))))
  mpisyl(w0, Rel((c0[c1]c2)), (c0[c1]c2)‚äÜ((c0[(Hom ` c4)]c2)√ó(c2[(Hom ` c4)]c0)), Rel(((c0[(Hom ` c4)]c2)√ó(c2[(Hom ` c4)]c0))))
  invss(c0, c1, c2, (Hom ` c4), c3, c4, w0)

  relxp((c0[(Hom ` c4)]c2), (c2[(Hom ` c4)]c0))

  alrimiv(hs2, w0, ((hs0[(c0[c1]c2)]hs1 ‚àß hs0[(c0[c1]c2)]hs2)‚Üí hs1 = hs2))
  ex(w0, (hs0[(c0[c1]c2)]hs1 ‚àß hs0[(c0[c1]c2)]hs2), hs1 = hs2)
  sectcan(hs1, hs2, c3, c4, (Sect ` c4), c2, c0, hs0, (w0 ‚àß(hs0[(c0[c1]c2)]hs1 ‚àß hs0[(c0[c1]c2)]hs2)))
  adantr(w0, (hs0[(c0[c1]c2)]hs1 ‚àß hs0[(c0[c1]c2)]hs2), c4 ‚àà Cat)
  adantr(w0, (hs0[(c0[c1]c2)]hs1 ‚àß hs0[(c0[c1]c2)]hs2), c2 ‚àà c3)

  simplbda(w0, hs0[(c0[c1]c2)]hs1, hs1[(c2[(Sect ` c4)]c0)]hs0, hs0[(c0[(Sect ` c4)]c2)]hs1)
  isinv(hs0, c0, c1, c2, hs1, (Sect ` c4), c3, c4, w0)
  adantrl(w0, hs0[(c0[c1]c2)]hs1, hs0[(c0[c1]c2)]hs2, hs0[(c0[(Sect ` c4)]c2)]hs2)
  simprbda(w0, hs0[(c0[c1]c2)]hs2, hs0[(c0[(Sect ` c4)]c2)]hs2, hs2[(c2[(Sect ` c4)]c0)]hs0)
  isinv(hs0, c0, c1, c2, hs2, (Sect ` c4), c3, c4, w0)
  eqid((Sect ` c4))

blocks.name: isoval
blocks.content: The isomorphisms are the domain of the inverse relation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.) (Proof shortened by AV, 21-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm isoval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), cdm(co(c0, c3, c2))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cinv, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, ccat))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(ciso, c5))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, c1, c2), cdm(co(c0, c3, c2)), co(c0, ccom(cmpt(hs0, universe, cdm(cv(hs0))), c3), c2), w0)
  oveqd(c0, c1, c2, ccom(cmpt(hs0, universe, cdm(cv(hs0))), c3), w0)
  3eqtr4g(c1, ccom(cmpt(hs0, universe, cdm(cv(hs0))), c3), cfv(ciso, c5), ccom(cmpt(hs0, universe, cdm(cv(hs0))), cfv(cinv, c5)), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(ciso, c5), ccom(cmpt(hs0, universe, cdm(cv(hs0))), cfv(cinv, c5))), wcel(c5, ccat))
  isofval(hs0, c5)
  coeq2i(cmpt(hs0, universe, cdm(cv(hs0))), c3, cfv(cinv, c5))
  3eqtr4g(co(c0, ccom(cmpt(hs0, universe, cdm(cv(hs0))), c3), c2), cdm(co(c0, c3, c2)), cfv(ccom(cmpt(hs0, universe, cdm(cv(hs0))), c3), cop(c0, c2)), cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, cdm(cv(hs0))), cfv(c3, cop(c0, c2))), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(ccom(cmpt(hs0, universe, cdm(cv(hs0))), c3), cop(c0, c2)), cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, cdm(cv(hs0))), cfv(c3, cop(c0, c2)))), wfn(c3, cxp(c4, c4)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cxp(c4, c4)))
  mpbiri(w0, wfn(c3, cxp(c4, c4)), wfn(cmpo(hs1, hs2, c4, c4, cin(co(cv(hs1), cfv(csect, c5), cv(hs2)), ccnv(co(cv(hs2), cfv(csect, c5), cv(hs1))))), cxp(c4, c4)))
  fnmpt2i(hs1, hs2, cmpo(hs1, hs2, c4, c4, cin(co(cv(hs1), cfv(csect, c5), cv(hs2)), ccnv(co(cv(hs2), cfv(csect, c5), cv(hs1))))), c4, c4, cin(co(cv(hs1), cfv(csect, c5), cv(hs2)), ccnv(co(cv(hs2), cfv(csect, c5), cv(hs1)))))
  eqid(cmpo(hs1, hs2, c4, c4, cin(co(cv(hs1), cfv(csect, c5), cv(hs2)), ccnv(co(cv(hs2), cfv(csect, c5), cv(hs1))))))
  inex1(co(cv(hs1), cfv(csect, c5), cv(hs2)), ccnv(co(cv(hs2), cfv(csect, c5), cv(hs1))))
  ovex(cv(hs1), cfv(csect, c5), cv(hs2))
  fneq1d(c3, cxp(c4, c4), cmpo(hs1, hs2, c4, c4, cin(co(cv(hs1), cfv(csect, c5), cv(hs2)), ccnv(co(cv(hs2), cfv(csect, c5), cv(hs1))))), w0)
  invffval(hs1, hs2, c3, c4, cfv(csect, c5), c5, c0, c2, w0)
  eqid(cfv(csect, c5))
  opelxpd(c0, c2, c4, c4, w0)
  fvco2(c3, cxp(c4, c4), cop(c0, c2), cmpt(hs0, universe, cdm(cv(hs0))))
  df-ov(c0, ccom(cmpt(hs0, universe, cdm(cv(hs0))), c3), c2)
  eqtr3i(cdm(co(c0, c3, c2)), cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, cdm(cv(hs0))), cfv(c3, cop(c0, c2))), cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, cdm(cv(hs0))), co(c0, c3, c2)))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, cdm(cv(hs0))), co(c0, c3, c2)), cdm(co(c0, c3, c2))), wcel(co(c0, c3, c2), universe))
  fvmpt(hs0, co(c0, c3, c2), universe, cmpt(hs0, universe, cdm(cv(hs0))), cdm(co(c0, c3, c2)), cdm(cv(hs0)))
  dmeq(cv(hs0), co(c0, c3, c2))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, universe, cdm(cv(hs0))))
  dmex(co(c0, c3, c2))
  ovex(c0, c3, c2)
  fveq2i(cmpt(hs0, universe, cdm(cv(hs0))), co(c0, c3, c2), cfv(c3, cop(c0, c2)))
  df-ov(c0, c3, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs2.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(csect, c5))
  diff.hs1.c(c5)

}

thm isoval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[c1]c2)= dom((c0[c3]c2)))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c5)

  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Iso ` c5)

  eqtrd((c0[c1]c2), dom((c0[c3]c2)), (c0[((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ dom(hs0))‚àò c3)]c2), w0)
  oveqd(c0, c1, c2, ((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ dom(hs0))‚àò c3), w0)

  syl(w0, (Iso ` c5)=((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ dom(hs0))‚àò(Inv ` c5)), c5 ‚àà Cat)
  isofval(hs0, c5)

  3eqtr4g((c0[((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ dom(hs0))‚àò c3)]c2), dom((c0[c3]c2)), (((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ dom(hs0))‚àò c3)` < c0, c2 >), ((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ dom(hs0))`(c3 ` < c0, c2 >)), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ dom(hs0))‚àò c3)` < c0, c2 >)=((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ dom(hs0))`(c3 ` < c0, c2 >)), c3[Fn](c4 √ó c4), < c0, c2 > ‚àà(c4 √ó c4))
  mpbiri(w0, c3[Fn](c4 √ó c4), (hs1 ‚àà c4, hs2 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶((hs1[(Sect ` c5)]hs2)‚ãÇ `'(hs2[(Sect ` c5)]hs1)))[Fn](c4 √ó c4))
  fnmpt2i(hs1, hs2, (hs1 ‚àà c4, hs2 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶((hs1[(Sect ` c5)]hs2)‚ãÇ `'(hs2[(Sect ` c5)]hs1))), c4, c4, ((hs1[(Sect ` c5)]hs2)‚ãÇ `'(hs2[(Sect ` c5)]hs1)))
  eqid((hs1 ‚àà c4, hs2 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶((hs1[(Sect ` c5)]hs2)‚ãÇ `'(hs2[(Sect ` c5)]hs1))))

  ovex(hs1, (Sect ` c5), hs2)
  fneq1d(c3, (c4 √ó c4), (hs1 ‚àà c4, hs2 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶((hs1[(Sect ` c5)]hs2)‚ãÇ `'(hs2[(Sect ` c5)]hs1))), w0)
  invffval(hs1, hs2, c3, c4, (Sect ` c5), c5, c0, c2, w0)
  eqid((Sect ` c5))
  opelxpd(c0, c2, c4, c4, w0)
  fvco2(c3, (c4 √ó c4), < c0, c2 >, (hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ dom(hs0)))
  df-ov(c0, ((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ dom(hs0))‚àò c3), c2)
  eqtr3i(dom((c0[c3]c2)), ((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ dom(hs0))`(c3 ` < c0, c2 >)), ((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ dom(hs0))`(c0[c3]c2)))
  ax-mp(((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ dom(hs0))`(c0[c3]c2))= dom((c0[c3]c2)), (c0[c3]c2)‚àà ùïå)

blocks.name: dfiso3
blocks.content: Alternate definition of an isomorphism of a category as a section in both directions. (Contributed by AV, 11-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfiso3(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), wrex(s0, co(c3, c4, c1), wa(wbr(cv(s0), co(c3, c5, c1), c0), wbr(c0, co(c1, c5, c3), cv(s0))))))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cbs, c7))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(chom, c7))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ciso, c7))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(csect, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, ccat))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, c4, c3)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  bitrd(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), wrex(s0, co(c3, c4, c1), wa(wbr(cv(s0), co(c3, c5, c1), c0), wbr(c0, co(c1, c5, c3), cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, co(c3, c4, c1), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), co(cop(c1, c3), cfv(cco, c7), c1), c0), cfv(cfv(ccid, c7), c1)), wceq(co(c0, co(cop(c3, c1), cfv(cco, c7), c3), cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(ccid, c7), c3)))))
  dfiso2(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, co(cop(c1, c3), cfv(cco, c7), c1), cfv(ccid, c7), co(cop(c3, c1), cfv(cco, c7), c3), c6, c7, w0)
  eqid(co(cop(c1, c3), cfv(cco, c7), c1))
  eqid(co(cop(c3, c1), cfv(cco, c7), c3))
  rexbidva(s0, co(c3, c4, c1), w0, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), co(cop(c1, c3), cfv(cco, c7), c1), c0), cfv(cfv(ccid, c7), c1)), wceq(co(c0, co(cop(c3, c1), cfv(cco, c7), c3), cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(ccid, c7), c3))), wa(wbr(cv(s0), co(c3, c5, c1), c0), wbr(c0, co(c1, c5, c3), cv(s0))))
  syl6rbb(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, c4, c1))), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), co(cop(c1, c3), cfv(cco, c7), c1), c0), cfv(cfv(ccid, c7), c1)), wceq(co(c0, co(cop(c3, c1), cfv(cco, c7), c3), cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(ccid, c7), c3))), wa(wbr(cv(s0), co(c3, c5, c1), c0), wbr(c0, co(c1, c5, c3), cv(s0))), wa(wceq(co(c0, co(cop(c3, c1), cfv(cco, c7), c3), cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(ccid, c7), c3)), wceq(co(cv(s0), co(cop(c1, c3), cfv(cco, c7), c1), c0), cfv(cfv(ccid, c7), c1))))
  anbi12d(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, c4, c1))), wbr(cv(s0), co(c3, c5, c1), c0), wbr(c0, co(c1, c5, c3), cv(s0)), wceq(co(c0, co(cop(c3, c1), cfv(cco, c7), c3), cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(ccid, c7), c3)), wceq(co(cv(s0), co(cop(c1, c3), cfv(cco, c7), c1), c0), cfv(cfv(ccid, c7), c1)))
  issect2(cv(s0), c3, c5, c1, c0, cfv(cco, c7), cfv(ccid, c7), c6, c7, c4, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, c4, c1))))
  issect2(c0, c1, c5, c3, cv(s0), cfv(cco, c7), cfv(ccid, c7), c6, c7, c4, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, c4, c1))))
  eqid(cfv(cco, c7))
  eqid(cfv(ccid, c7))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, c4, c1)), wcel(c7, ccat))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, c4, c1)), wcel(c1, c6))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, c4, c1)), wcel(c3, c6))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, c4, c1)), wcel(c0, co(c1, c4, c3)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, c4, c1)))
  ancom(wceq(co(c0, co(cop(c3, c1), cfv(cco, c7), c3), cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(ccid, c7), c3)), wceq(co(cv(s0), co(cop(c1, c3), cfv(cco, c7), c1), c0), cfv(cfv(ccid, c7), c1)))
  diff.co.s(s0, cop(c1, c3), cfv(cco, c7), c1)
  diff.cop.s(s0, c1, c3)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ccid, c7)
  diff.ccid.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, cop(c3, c1), cfv(cco, c7), c3)
  diff.cop.s(s0, c3, c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cco, c7)
  diff.cco.s(s0)

thm dfiso3(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà(c1[c2]c3)‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(c3[c4]c1),(s0[(c3[c5]c1)]c0 ‚àß c0[(c1[c5]c3)]s0))))
  ‚ä£ c6 =(Base ` c7)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Hom ` c7)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Iso ` c7)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(Sect ` c7)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c7 ‚àà Cat)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà(c1[c4]c3))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c7)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  bitrd(w0, c0 ‚àà(c1[c2]c3), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(c3[c4]c1),(s0[(c3[c5]c1)]c0 ‚àß c0[(c1[c5]c3)]s0)), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(c3[c4]c1),((s0[(< c1, c3 >[(comp ` c7)]c1)]c0)=((Id ` c7)` c1)‚àß(c0[(< c3, c1 >[(comp ` c7)]c3)]s0)=((Id ` c7)` c3))))
  dfiso2(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, (< c1, c3 >[(comp ` c7)]c1), (Id ` c7), (< c3, c1 >[(comp ` c7)]c3), c6, c7, w0)
  eqid((< c1, c3 >[(comp ` c7)]c1))
  eqid((< c3, c1 >[(comp ` c7)]c3))
  rexbidva(s0, (c3[c4]c1), w0, ((s0[(< c1, c3 >[(comp ` c7)]c1)]c0)=((Id ` c7)` c1)‚àß(c0[(< c3, c1 >[(comp ` c7)]c3)]s0)=((Id ` c7)` c3)), (s0[(c3[c5]c1)]c0 ‚àß c0[(c1[c5]c3)]s0))
  syl6rbb((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(c3[c4]c1)), ((s0[(< c1, c3 >[(comp ` c7)]c1)]c0)=((Id ` c7)` c1)‚àß(c0[(< c3, c1 >[(comp ` c7)]c3)]s0)=((Id ` c7)` c3)), (s0[(c3[c5]c1)]c0 ‚àß c0[(c1[c5]c3)]s0), ((c0[(< c3, c1 >[(comp ` c7)]c3)]s0)=((Id ` c7)` c3)‚àß(s0[(< c1, c3 >[(comp ` c7)]c1)]c0)=((Id ` c7)` c1)))
  anbi12d((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(c3[c4]c1)), s0[(c3[c5]c1)]c0, c0[(c1[c5]c3)]s0, (c0[(< c3, c1 >[(comp ` c7)]c3)]s0)=((Id ` c7)` c3), (s0[(< c1, c3 >[(comp ` c7)]c1)]c0)=((Id ` c7)` c1))
  issect2(s0, c3, c5, c1, c0, (comp ` c7), (Id ` c7), c6, c7, c4, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(c3[c4]c1)))
  issect2(c0, c1, c5, c3, s0, (comp ` c7), (Id ` c7), c6, c7, c4, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(c3[c4]c1)))
  eqid((comp ` c7))
  eqid((Id ` c7))
  adantr(w0, s0 ‚àà(c3[c4]c1), c7 ‚àà Cat)
  adantr(w0, s0 ‚àà(c3[c4]c1), c1 ‚àà c6)
  adantr(w0, s0 ‚àà(c3[c4]c1), c3 ‚àà c6)
  adantr(w0, s0 ‚àà(c3[c4]c1), c0 ‚àà(c1[c4]c3))
  simpr(w0, s0 ‚àà(c3[c4]c1))
  ancom((c0[(< c3, c1 >[(comp ` c7)]c3)]s0)=((Id ` c7)` c3), (s0[(< c1, c3 >[(comp ` c7)]c1)]c0)=((Id ` c7)` c1))
  diff.co.s(s0, < c1, c3 >, (comp ` c7), c1)
  diff.cop.s(s0, c1, c3)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ccid, c7)
  diff.ccid.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, < c3, c1 >, (comp ` c7), c3)
  diff.cop.s(s0, c3, c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cco, c7)
  diff.cco.s(s0)

blocks.name: inveq
blocks.content: If there are two inverses of a morphism, these inverses are equal. Corollary 3.11 of [Adamek] p. 28. (Contributed by AV, 10-Apr-2020.) (Revised by AV, 3-Jul-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm inveq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wa(wbr(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), c4), wbr(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), c5)), wceq(c4, c5)))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cbs, c7))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cinv, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, ccat))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c6))
} = {
  ex(w0, wa(wbr(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), c4), wbr(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), c5)), wceq(c4, c5))
  sectcan(c4, c5, c6, c7, cfv(csect, c7), c3, c1, c0, wa(w0, wa(wbr(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), c4), wbr(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), c5))))
  adantr(w0, wa(wbr(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), c4), wbr(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), c5)), wcel(c7, ccat))
  adantr(w0, wa(wbr(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), c4), wbr(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), c5)), wcel(c3, c6))
  adantr(w0, wa(wbr(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), c4), wbr(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), c5)), wcel(c1, c6))
  impcom(w0, wa(wbr(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), c4), wbr(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), c5)), wbr(c4, co(c3, cfv(csect, c7), c1), c0))
  adantr(wbr(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), c4), wbr(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), c5), wi(w0, wbr(c4, co(c3, cfv(csect, c7), c1), c0)))
  com12(wbr(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), c4), w0, wbr(c4, co(c3, cfv(csect, c7), c1), c0))
  syl6bi(w0, wbr(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), c4), wbr(c4, co(c3, cfv(csect, c7), c1), c0), wa(wbr(c0, co(c1, cfv(csect, c7), c3), c4), wbr(c4, co(c3, cfv(csect, c7), c1), c0)))
  isinv(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, cfv(csect, c7), c6, c7, w0)
  simpr(wbr(c0, co(c1, cfv(csect, c7), c3), c4), wbr(c4, co(c3, cfv(csect, c7), c1), c0))
  imp(w0, wa(wbr(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), c4), wbr(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), c5)), wbr(c0, co(c1, cfv(csect, c7), c3), c5))
  adantld(w0, wbr(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), c4), wbr(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), c5), wbr(c0, co(c1, cfv(csect, c7), c3), c5))
  syl6bi(w0, wbr(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), c5), wbr(c0, co(c1, cfv(csect, c7), c3), c5), wa(wbr(c0, co(c1, cfv(csect, c7), c3), c5), wbr(c5, co(c3, cfv(csect, c7), c1), c0)))
  isinv(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5, cfv(csect, c7), c6, c7, w0)
  eqid(cfv(csect, c7))
  simpl(wbr(c0, co(c1, cfv(csect, c7), c3), c5), wbr(c5, co(c3, cfv(csect, c7), c1), c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm inveq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((c0[(c1[c2]c3)]c4 ‚àß c0[(c1[c2]c3)]c5)‚Üí c4 = c5))
  ‚ä£ c6 =(Base ` c7)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Inv ` c7)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c7 ‚àà Cat)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c6)
} = {
  ex(w0, (c0[(c1[c2]c3)]c4 ‚àß c0[(c1[c2]c3)]c5), c4 = c5)
  sectcan(c4, c5, c6, c7, (Sect ` c7), c3, c1, c0, (w0 ‚àß(c0[(c1[c2]c3)]c4 ‚àß c0[(c1[c2]c3)]c5)))
  adantr(w0, (c0[(c1[c2]c3)]c4 ‚àß c0[(c1[c2]c3)]c5), c7 ‚àà Cat)
  adantr(w0, (c0[(c1[c2]c3)]c4 ‚àß c0[(c1[c2]c3)]c5), c3 ‚àà c6)
  adantr(w0, (c0[(c1[c2]c3)]c4 ‚àß c0[(c1[c2]c3)]c5), c1 ‚àà c6)
  impcom(w0, (c0[(c1[c2]c3)]c4 ‚àß c0[(c1[c2]c3)]c5), c4[(c3[(Sect ` c7)]c1)]c0)
  adantr(c0[(c1[c2]c3)]c4, c0[(c1[c2]c3)]c5, (w0 ‚Üí c4[(c3[(Sect ` c7)]c1)]c0))

blocks.name: isofn
blocks.content: The function value of the function returning the isomorphisms of a category is a function over the square product of the base set of the category. (Contributed by AV, 5-Apr-2020.)

blocks.name: isohom
blocks.content: An isomorphism is a homomorphism. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm isohom(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c0, c3, c2)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(chom, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(ciso, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, ccat))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
} = {
  syl6ss(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c0, c3, c2), cdm(cxp(co(c0, c3, c2), co(c2, c3, c0))), w0)
  eqsstrd(co(c0, c1, c2), cdm(cxp(co(c0, c3, c2), co(c2, c3, c0))), cdm(co(c0, cfv(cinv, c5), c2)), w0)
  isoval(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cinv, c5), c4, c5, w0)
  syl(w0, wss(cdm(co(c0, cfv(cinv, c5), c2)), cdm(cxp(co(c0, c3, c2), co(c2, c3, c0)))), wss(co(c0, cfv(cinv, c5), c2), cxp(co(c0, c3, c2), co(c2, c3, c0))))
  invss(c0, cfv(cinv, c5), c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  eqid(cfv(cinv, c5))
  dmss(co(c0, cfv(cinv, c5), c2), cxp(co(c0, c3, c2), co(c2, c3, c0)))
  dmxpss(co(c0, c3, c2), co(c2, c3, c0))
}

thm isohom(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[c1]c2)‚äÜ(c0[c3]c2))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Hom ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Iso ` c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà Cat)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c4)
} = {
  syl6ss((c0[c1]c2), (c0[c3]c2), dom(((c0[c3]c2)√ó(c2[c3]c0))), w0)
  eqsstrd((c0[c1]c2), dom(((c0[c3]c2)√ó(c2[c3]c0))), dom((c0[(Inv ` c5)]c2)), w0)
  isoval(c0, c1, c2, (Inv ` c5), c4, c5, w0)
  syl(w0, dom((c0[(Inv ` c5)]c2))‚äÜ dom(((c0[c3]c2)√ó(c2[c3]c0))), (c0[(Inv ` c5)]c2)‚äÜ((c0[c3]c2)√ó(c2[c3]c0)))
  invss(c0, (Inv ` c5), c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  eqid((Inv ` c5))
  dmss((c0[(Inv ` c5)]c2), ((c0[c3]c2)√ó(c2[c3]c0)))
  dmxpss((c0[c3]c2), (c2[c3]c0))
}

blocks.name: isoco
blocks.content: The composition of two isomorphisms is an isomorphism. Proposition 3.14(2) of [Adamek] p. 29. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm isoco(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, co(cop(c1, c2), c3, c4), c5), co(c1, c6, c4)))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cbs, c8))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cco, c8))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(ciso, c8))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c8, ccat))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, co(c1, c6, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c2, c6, c4)))
} = {
  inviso1(co(c0, co(cop(c1, c2), c3, c4), c5), c1, c6, c4, c7, c8, cfv(cinv, c8), co(cfv(co(c1, cfv(cinv, c8), c2), c5), co(cop(c4, c2), c3, c1), cfv(co(c2, cfv(cinv, c8), c4), c0)), w0)
  invco(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, cfv(cinv, c8), c7, c8, c6, w0)
  eqid(cfv(cinv, c8))
}

thm isoco(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[(< c1, c2 >[c3]c4)]c5)‚àà(c1[c6]c4))
  ‚ä£ c7 =(Base ` c8)

  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c8 ‚àà Cat)

  mpisyl(w0, wrel(co(c2, cfv(csect, c5), c0)), wss(co(c2, cfv(csect, c5), c0), cxp(co(c2, cfv(chom, c5), c0), co(c0, cfv(chom, c5), c2))), wrel(cxp(co(c2, cfv(chom, c5), c0), co(c0, cfv(chom, c5), c2))))
  sectss(c2, cfv(csect, c5), c0, cfv(chom, c5), c4, c5, cfv(cco, c5), cfv(ccid, c5), w0)
  eqid(cfv(chom, c5))
  eqid(cfv(cco, c5))
  eqid(cfv(ccid, c5))
  relxp(co(c2, cfv(chom, c5), c0), co(c0, cfv(chom, c5), c2))

thm oppcinv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[c1]c2)=(c2[c3]c0))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c5)

  ‚ä£ c1 =(Inv ` c6)
} = {
  3eqtr4d((c0[c1]c2), (c2[c3]c0), ((c0[(Sect ` c6)]c2)‚ãÇ `'(c2[(Sect ` c6)]c0)), ((c2[(Sect ` c5)]c0)‚ãÇ `'(c0[(Sect ` c5)]c2)), w0)

  eqtrd(`'(c2[(Sect ` c6)]c0), (c2[(Sect ` c5)]c0), `' `'(c2[(Sect ` c5)]c0), w0)

  oppcsect2(c2, (Sect ` c6), c0, (Sect ` c5), c4, c5, c6, w0)
  sylib(w0, `' `'(c2[(Sect ` c5)]c0)=(c2[(Sect ` c5)]c0), Rel((c2[(Sect ` c5)]c0)))
  mpisyl(w0, Rel((c2[(Sect ` c5)]c0)), (c2[(Sect ` c5)]c0)‚äÜ((c2[(Hom ` c5)]c0)√ó(c0[(Hom ` c5)]c2)), Rel(((c2[(Hom ` c5)]c0)√ó(c0[(Hom ` c5)]c2))))
  sectss(c2, (Sect ` c5), c0, (Hom ` c5), c4, c5, (comp ` c5), (Id ` c5), w0)

blocks.name: oppciso
blocks.content: An isomorphism in the opposite category. See also remark 3.9 in [Adamek] p. 28. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm oppciso(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c2, c3, c0)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(coppc, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, ccat))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ciso, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(ciso, c6))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c2, c3, c0), cdm(co(c0, cfv(cinv, c6), c2)), cdm(co(c2, cfv(cinv, c5), c0)), w0)
  dmeqd(co(c0, cfv(cinv, c6), c2), co(c2, cfv(cinv, c5), c0), w0)
  oppcinv(c0, cfv(cinv, c6), c2, cfv(cinv, c5), c4, c5, c6, w0)
  isoval(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cinv, c6), c4, c6, w0)
  oppcbas(c4, c6, c5)
  eqid(cfv(cinv, c6))
  syl(w0, wcel(c6, ccat), wcel(c5, ccat))
  oppccat(c5, c6)
  isoval(c2, c3, c0, cfv(cinv, c5), c4, c5, w0)
  eqid(cfv(cinv, c5))
}

thm oppciso(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[c1]c2)=(c2[c3]c0))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(oppCat ` c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà Cat)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Iso ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Iso ` c6)
} = {
  3eqtr4d((c0[c1]c2), (c2[c3]c0), dom((c0[(Inv ` c6)]c2)), dom((c2[(Inv ` c5)]c0)), w0)
  dmeqd((c0[(Inv ` c6)]c2), (c2[(Inv ` c5)]c0), w0)

  isoval(c0, c1, c2, (Inv ` c6), c4, c6, w0)
  oppcbas(c4, c6, c5)
  eqid((Inv ` c6))
  syl(w0, c6 ‚àà Cat, c5 ‚àà Cat)
  oppccat(c5, c6)
  isoval(c2, c3, c0, (Inv ` c5), c4, c5, w0)

}

blocks.name: sectmon
blocks.content: If ` F ` is a section of ` G ` , then ` F ` is a monomorphism. A monomorphism that arises from a section is also known as a _split monomorphism_. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)

blocks.name: monsect
blocks.content: If ` F ` is a monomorphism and ` G ` is a section of ` F ` , then ` G ` is an inverse of ` F ` and they are both isomorphisms. This is also stated as "a monomorphism which is also a split epimorphism is an isomorphism". (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm monsect(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cmon, c6))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(csect, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, ccat))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cinv, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, c7, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c4, co(c3, c8, c1), c0))
} = {
  mpbir2and(w0, wbr(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), c4), wbr(c0, co(c1, c8, c3), c4), wbr(c4, co(c3, c8, c1), c0))
  mpbird(w0, wbr(c0, co(c1, c8, c3), c4), wceq(co(c4, co(cop(c1, c3), cfv(cco, c6), c1), c0), cfv(cfv(ccid, c6), c1)))
  mpbid(w0, wceq(co(c4, co(cop(c1, c3), cfv(cco, c6), c1), c0), cfv(cfv(ccid, c6), c1)), wceq(co(c0, co(cop(c1, c1), cfv(cco, c6), c3), co(c4, co(cop(c1, c3), cfv(cco, c6), c1), c0)), co(c0, co(cop(c1, c1), cfv(cco, c6), c3), cfv(cfv(ccid, c6), c1))))
  3eqtr3d(co(c0, co(cop(c1, c1), cfv(cco, c6), c3), co(c4, co(cop(c1, c3), cfv(cco, c6), c1), c0)), co(c0, co(cop(c1, c1), cfv(cco, c6), c3), cfv(cfv(ccid, c6), c1)), co(co(c0, co(cop(c3, c1), cfv(cco, c6), c3), c4), co(cop(c1, c3), cfv(cco, c6), c3), c0), co(cfv(cfv(ccid, c6), c3), co(cop(c1, c3), cfv(cco, c6), c3), c0), w0)
  oveq1d(co(c0, co(cop(c3, c1), cfv(cco, c6), c3), c4), co(cop(c1, c3), cfv(cco, c6), c3), c0, cfv(cfv(ccid, c6), c3), w0)
  simp3d(w0, wceq(co(c0, co(cop(c3, c1), cfv(cco, c6), c3), c4), cfv(cfv(ccid, c6), c3)), wcel(c4, co(c3, cfv(chom, c6), c1)), wcel(c0, co(c1, cfv(chom, c6), c3)))
  catass(c0, c3, c1, cfv(cco, c6), c3, c4, c1, c0, c5, c6, cfv(chom, c6), w0)
  eqtr4d(co(cfv(cfv(ccid, c6), c3), co(cop(c1, c3), cfv(cco, c6), c3), c0), co(c0, co(cop(c1, c1), cfv(cco, c6), c3), cfv(cfv(ccid, c6), c1)), c0, w0)
  catlid(cfv(ccid, c6), c3, c1, cfv(cco, c6), c0, c5, c6, cfv(chom, c6), w0)
  catrid(c0, c1, cfv(cco, c6), c3, cfv(ccid, c6), c5, c6, cfv(chom, c6), w0)
  moni(c0, c1, c1, cfv(cco, c6), c3, co(c4, co(cop(c1, c3), cfv(cco, c6), c1), c0), cfv(cfv(ccid, c6), c1), c5, c6, cfv(chom, c6), c7, w0)
  catcocl(c4, c1, c3, cfv(cco, c6), c1, c0, cfv(chom, c6), c5, c6, w0)
  catidcl(cfv(ccid, c6), c1, cfv(chom, c6), c5, c6, w0)
  issect2(c0, c1, c8, c3, c4, cfv(cco, c6), cfv(ccid, c6), c5, c6, cfv(chom, c6), w0)
  simp2d(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cfv(chom, c6), c3)), wcel(c4, co(c3, cfv(chom, c6), c1)), wceq(co(c0, co(cop(c3, c1), cfv(cco, c6), c3), c4), cfv(cfv(ccid, c6), c3)))
  simp1d(w0, wcel(c4, co(c3, cfv(chom, c6), c1)), wcel(c0, co(c1, cfv(chom, c6), c3)), wceq(co(c0, co(cop(c3, c1), cfv(cco, c6), c3), c4), cfv(cfv(ccid, c6), c3)))
  mpbid(w0, w3a(wcel(c4, co(c3, cfv(chom, c6), c1)), wcel(c0, co(c1, cfv(chom, c6), c3)), wceq(co(c0, co(cop(c3, c1), cfv(cco, c6), c3), c4), cfv(cfv(ccid, c6), c3))), wbr(c4, co(c3, c8, c1), c0))
  issect(c4, c3, c8, c1, c0, cfv(chom, c6), cfv(cco, c6), cfv(ccid, c6), c5, c6, w0)
  eqid(cfv(chom, c6))
  eqid(cfv(cco, c6))
  eqid(cfv(ccid, c6))
  isinv(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c8, c5, c6, w0)

thm monsect(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0[(c1[c2]c3)]c4)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(Base ` c6)
  ‚ä£ c7 =(Mono ` c6)
  ‚ä£ c8 =(Sect ` c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c6 ‚àà Cat)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Inv ` c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà(c1[c7]c3))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4[(c3[c8]c1)]c0)
} = {
  mpbir2and(w0, c0[(c1[c2]c3)]c4, c0[(c1[c8]c3)]c4, c4[(c3[c8]c1)]c0)
  mpbird(w0, c0[(c1[c8]c3)]c4, (c4[(< c1, c3 >[(comp ` c6)]c1)]c0)=((Id ` c6)` c1))
  mpbid(w0, (c4[(< c1, c3 >[(comp ` c6)]c1)]c0)=((Id ` c6)` c1), (c0[(< c1, c1 >[(comp ` c6)]c3)](c4[(< c1, c3 >[(comp ` c6)]c1)]c0))=(c0[(< c1, c1 >[(comp ` c6)]c3)]((Id ` c6)` c1)))
  3eqtr3d((c0[(< c1, c1 >[(comp ` c6)]c3)](c4[(< c1, c3 >[(comp ` c6)]c1)]c0)), (c0[(< c1, c1 >[(comp ` c6)]c3)]((Id ` c6)` c1)), ((c0[(< c3, c1 >[(comp ` c6)]c3)]c4)[(< c1, c3 >[(comp ` c6)]c3)]c0), (((Id ` c6)` c3)[(< c1, c3 >[(comp ` c6)]c3)]c0), w0)
  oveq1d((c0[(< c3, c1 >[(comp ` c6)]c3)]c4), (< c1, c3 >[(comp ` c6)]c3), c0, ((Id ` c6)` c3), w0)
  simp3d(w0, (c0[(< c3, c1 >[(comp ` c6)]c3)]c4)=((Id ` c6)` c3), c4 ‚àà(c3[(Hom ` c6)]c1), c0 ‚àà(c1[(Hom ` c6)]c3))
  catass(c0, c3, c1, (comp ` c6), c3, c4, c1, c0, c5, c6, (Hom ` c6), w0)
  eqtr4d((((Id ` c6)` c3)[(< c1, c3 >[(comp ` c6)]c3)]c0), (c0[(< c1, c1 >[(comp ` c6)]c3)]((Id ` c6)` c1)), c0, w0)
  catlid((Id ` c6), c3, c1, (comp ` c6), c0, c5, c6, (Hom ` c6), w0)
  catrid(c0, c1, (comp ` c6), c3, (Id ` c6), c5, c6, (Hom ` c6), w0)
  moni(c0, c1, c1, (comp ` c6), c3, (c4[(< c1, c3 >[(comp ` c6)]c1)]c0), ((Id ` c6)` c1), c5, c6, (Hom ` c6), c7, w0)
  catcocl(c4, c1, c3, (comp ` c6), c1, c0, (Hom ` c6), c5, c6, w0)
  catidcl((Id ` c6), c1, (Hom ` c6), c5, c6, w0)
  issect2(c0, c1, c8, c3, c4, (comp ` c6), (Id ` c6), c5, c6, (Hom ` c6), w0)
  simp2d(w0, c0 ‚àà(c1[(Hom ` c6)]c3), c4 ‚àà(c3[(Hom ` c6)]c1), (c0[(< c3, c1 >[(comp ` c6)]c3)]c4)=((Id ` c6)` c3))
  simp1d(w0, c4 ‚àà(c3[(Hom ` c6)]c1), c0 ‚àà(c1[(Hom ` c6)]c3), (c0[(< c3, c1 >[(comp ` c6)]c3)]c4)=((Id ` c6)` c3))
  mpbid(w0, (c4 ‚àà(c3[(Hom ` c6)]c1)‚àß c0 ‚àà(c1[(Hom ` c6)]c3)‚àß(c0[(< c3, c1 >[(comp ` c6)]c3)]c4)=((Id ` c6)` c3)), c4[(c3[c8]c1)]c0)
  issect(c4, c3, c8, c1, c0, (Hom ` c6), (comp ` c6), (Id ` c6), c5, c6, w0)

blocks.name: sectepi
blocks.content: If ` F ` is a section of ` G ` , then ` G ` is an epimorphism. An epimorphism that arises from a section is also known as a _split epimorphism_. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm sectepi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cepi, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(csect, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, ccat))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c7, co(c3, c6, c1), c0))
} = {
  eleqtrd(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), co(c3, cfv(cmon, cfv(coppc, c5)), c1), w0)
  sectmon(c0, c3, cfv(cmon, cfv(coppc, c5)), c1, c4, cfv(coppc, c5), cfv(csect, cfv(coppc, c5)), c7, w0)
  oppcbas(c4, cfv(coppc, c5), c5)
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(coppc, c5), ccat), wcel(c5, ccat))
  oppccat(c5, cfv(coppc, c5))
  mpbird(w0, wbr(c0, co(c3, cfv(csect, cfv(coppc, c5)), c1), c7), wbr(c7, co(c3, c6, c1), c0))
  oppcsect(c0, c3, cfv(csect, cfv(coppc, c5)), c1, c7, c6, c4, c5, cfv(coppc, c5), w0)
  eqid(cfv(csect, cfv(coppc, c5)))
  oppcmon(c3, cfv(cmon, cfv(coppc, c5)), c1, c2, cfv(coppc, c5), c5, w0)
  eqid(cfv(coppc, c5))
  eqid(cfv(cmon, cfv(coppc, c5)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sectepi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà(c1[c2]c3))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Epi ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(Sect ` c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà Cat)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c7[(c3[c6]c1)]c0)
} = {
  eleqtrd(c0, (c1[c2]c3), (c3[(Mono `(oppCat ` c5))]c1), w0)
  sectmon(c0, c3, (Mono `(oppCat ` c5)), c1, c4, (oppCat ` c5), (Sect `(oppCat ` c5)), c7, w0)
  oppcbas(c4, (oppCat ` c5), c5)
  syl(w0, (oppCat ` c5)‚àà Cat, c5 ‚àà Cat)
  oppccat(c5, (oppCat ` c5))
  mpbird(w0, c0[(c3[(Sect `(oppCat ` c5))]c1)]c7, c7[(c3[c6]c1)]c0)

blocks.name: episect
blocks.content: If ` F ` is an epimorphism and ` F ` is a section of ` G ` , then ` G ` is an inverse of ` F ` and they are both isomorphisms. This is also stated as "an epimorphism which is also a split monomorphism is an isomorphism". (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm episect(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cepi, c6))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(csect, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, ccat))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cinv, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, c7, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, co(c1, c8, c3), c4))
} = {
  breqdi(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), c4, co(c3, cfv(cinv, cfv(coppc, c6)), c1), w0)
  oppcinv(c3, cfv(cinv, cfv(coppc, c6)), c1, c2, c5, c6, cfv(coppc, c6), w0)
  monsect(c0, c3, cfv(cinv, cfv(coppc, c6)), c1, c4, c5, cfv(coppc, c6), cfv(cmon, cfv(coppc, c6)), cfv(csect, cfv(coppc, c6)), w0)
  oppcbas(c5, cfv(coppc, c6), c6)
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(coppc, c6), ccat), wcel(c6, ccat))
  oppccat(c6, cfv(coppc, c6))
  eqid(cfv(cinv, cfv(coppc, c6)))
  eleqtrrd(c0, co(c3, cfv(cmon, cfv(coppc, c6)), c1), co(c1, c7, c3), w0)
  oppcmon(c3, cfv(cmon, cfv(coppc, c6)), c1, c7, cfv(coppc, c6), c6, w0)
  eqid(cfv(cmon, cfv(coppc, c6)))
  mpbird(w0, wbr(c4, co(c1, cfv(csect, cfv(coppc, c6)), c3), c0), wbr(c0, co(c1, c8, c3), c4))
  oppcsect(c4, c1, cfv(csect, cfv(coppc, c6)), c3, c0, c8, c5, c6, cfv(coppc, c6), w0)
  eqid(cfv(coppc, c6))
  eqid(cfv(csect, cfv(coppc, c6)))
}

blocks.name: invid
blocks.content: The inverse of the identity is the identity. (Contributed by AV, 8-Apr-2020.)

blocks.name: idiso
blocks.content: The identity is an isomorphism. Example 3.13 of [Adamek] p. 28. (Contributed by AV, 8-Apr-2020.)

blocks.name: idinv
blocks.content: The inverse of the identity is the identity. Example 3.13 of [Adamek] p. 28. (Contributed by AV, 9-Apr-2020.)
